page.title: 09Sandford House - Today
page.content:
Today Sandford House and the outside buildings have been turned into{twenty {flats.}The family who owned the house have moved away, and all the flats are sold.
The house still looks the same as it did when it was a family home and the flats have not spoiled the house.
A gardener comes once a month to tend the garden. A{wellingtonia tree}is now taller than the house. Wild rabbits still live in the garden. Garages have been built for the owners of the flats, and the stables have been changed into a flat.
